creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque, one half is a hollow, curved piece of silver that curves over on itself, and ends with a curlicue on each side; curved piece is attached to a half-circle piece of hollow silver; this half-circle has a medallion with a symbol and waves inside; medallion is surrounded by a bird on left and dragon on right; half circle has thirteen, chime-like dangling pieces
title: Torque
